allow: Bash(.venvScriptspython -c "from app.database import SessionLocal; from app.models.disease import Disease; from app.models.disease_symptom import DiseaseSymptom; db = SessionLocal\(\); result = db.query\(Disease.id, Disease.name\).filter\(Disease.name.in_\([''삼차신경통'', ''협심증'']\)\).all\(\); print\(''질병 ID:''\); [print\(f''{r[0]}: {r[1]}''\) for r in result]; print\(''\\n증상 수:''\); counts = db.query\(DiseaseSymptom.disease_id, db.func.count\(DiseaseSymptom.symptom_id\)\).filter\(DiseaseSymptom.disease_id.in_\([r[0] for r in result]\)\).group_by\(DiseaseSymptom.disease_id\).all\(\); [print\(f''질병 {c[0]}: {c[1]}개''\) for c in counts]")

Bash(.venvScriptspython.exe -c "from app.database import SessionLocal; from app.models.disease import Disease; from app.models.disease_symptom import DiseaseSymptom; db = SessionLocal\(\); result = db.query\(Disease.id, Disease.name\).filter\(Disease.name.in_\([''삼차신경통'', ''협심증'']\)\).all\(\); print\(''질병 ID:''\); [print\(f''{r[0]}: {r[1]}''\) for r in result]; print\(''\\n증상 수:''\); counts = db.query\(DiseaseSymptom.disease_id, db.func.count\(DiseaseSymptom.symptom_id\)\).filter\(DiseaseSymptom.disease_id.in_\([r[0] for r in result]\)\).group_by\(DiseaseSymptom.disease_id\).all\(\); [print\(f''질병 {c[0]}: {c[1]}개''\) for c in counts]")
